description: Detects usage of "ProtocolHandler" to download files. Downloaded files will be located in the cache folder (for example - %LOCALAPPDATA%\Microsoft\Windows\INetCache\IE)
author: frack113
name: File Download Using ProtocolHandler.exe
query: (((process.executable.text:*\\protocolhandler.exe) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"ProtocolHandler.exe")) AND (((process.command_line.text:*\"ms\-word* AND process.command_line.text:*.docx\"*)) OR (process.command_line.text:*\ http*)))
